医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
AI模型GPT-4超越非专业医生评估眼部问题的能力剑桥大学领导的一项研究发现，GPT-4的临床知识和推理能力正在接近专科眼科医生的水平。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240417/AI-model-GPT-4-exceeds-unspecialized-doctors-ability-to-assess-eye-problems.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240417/AI-model-GPT-4-exceeds-unspecialized-doctors-ability-to-assess-eye-problems.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=519cb0cf-a307-4497-ad5a-6bfa506f2b24 Wed, 17 Apr 2024 23:58:00 -0400 AI model GPT-4 exceeds unspecialized doctors' ability to assess eye problems
突破性成像方法提高前列腺癌治疗的精确度一种新颖的 SPECT/CT 采集方法可以方便地准确检测前列腺癌患者的放射性药物生物分布，为更加个性化的治疗打开了大门。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240417/Breakthrough-imaging-method-enhances- precision-in-prostate-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240417/Breakthrough-imaging-method-enhances- precision-in-prostate-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=73b27e5d-5eeb-4dd5-98a1-42ced257ebaa Wed, 17 Apr 2024 23:55:00 -0400 Breakthrough imaging method enhances precision in prostate cancer treatment
研究提出了一种有前途的理解自闭症的新方法由于自闭症谱系障碍的症状和严重程度多种多样，因此尚未将其与单一原因联系起来。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240417/Study-suggests-a-promising-new-approach-to-understanding-autism.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240417/Study-suggests-a-promising-new-approach-to-understanding-autism.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=26ab78a9-141c-401f-84a2-636586415c92 Wed, 17 Apr 2024 23:52:00 -0400 Study suggests a promising new approach to understanding autism
研究发现，接触绿色空间可以促进肠道和皮肤微生物群的健康《国际环境》中的一项系统综述发现，接触绿色空间可以增强肠道和皮肤微生物群的多样性和组成，但对口腔、鼻腔和眼部微生物群的影响尚不清楚。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240417/Greenspace-exposure-boosts-gut-and-skin-microbiota-health-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240417/Greenspace-exposure-boosts-gut-and-skin-microbiota-health-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0e8705a7-6dea-42e9-9b64-56ce7e865c10 Wed, 17 Apr 2024 23:51:00 -0400 Greenspace exposure boosts gut and skin microbiota health, study finds
GPT-4 在发现错误方面与放射科医生的准确度相当，可大幅缩短时间和成本研究人员发现，GPT-4 可以有效识别并纠正放射学报告中的错误，其准确性与人类放射科医生相当，但时间效率和成本效益更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240417/GPT-4-matches-radiograph-accuracy-in-spotting-errors-cuts-time-and-costs-dramatically.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240417/GPT-4-matches-radiograph-accuracy-in-spotting-errors-cuts-time-and-costs-dramatically.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3fee88d0-ca93-4eac-a8c9-7828144f6562 Wed, 17 Apr 2024 23:28:00 -0400 GPT-4 matches radiologist accuracy in spotting errors, cuts time and costs dramatically
宾夕法尼亚州立大学的研究调查了热量限制如何影响一个人的端粒宾夕法尼亚州立大学的研究人员可能已经揭开了饮食如何影响衰老之谜的另一层复杂性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240417/Penn-State-study-examines-how-a-persons-telomeres-are-affected-by-caloric-restriction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240417/Penn-State-study-examines-how-a-persons-telomeres-are-affected-by-caloric-restriction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7ee42607-2711-428c-b8aa-a313b39c031b Wed, 17 Apr 2024 23:08:41 -0400 Penn State study examines how a person's telomeres are affected by caloric restriction
研究显示苏格兰的阿片类药物依赖仍然很高但基本稳定根据布里斯托大学领导的一项新的分析，苏格兰的阿片类药物依赖仍然很高，但基本稳定，该分析今天发表在《成瘾》杂志上 [4 月 18 日] 和苏格兰公共卫生部门。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240417/Opioid-dependence-in-Scotland-remains-high-but-largely-stable-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240417/Opioid-dependence-in-Scotland-remains-high-but-largely-stable-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=67899311-5974-45a8-9e41-1a440080f46c Wed, 17 Apr 2024 22:52:59 -0400 Opioid dependence in Scotland remains high but largely stable, study shows
研究揭示心房颤动的长期后果今天《英国医学杂志》上丹麦的一项研究发现，在过去二十年中，心房颤动（一种导致心率不规则且通常异常快的心脏病）的终生风险已从四分之一增加到三分之一。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240417/Study-reveals-long-term-consequences-of-atrial-fibrillation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240417/Study-reveals-long-term-consequences-of-atrial-fibrillation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=30567b6d-0ce8-4956-9a4d-2c07d58f7177 Wed, 17 Apr 2024 22:47:29 -0400 Study reveals long-term consequences of atrial fibrillation
新研究确定了前列腺癌易发生铁死亡的关键途径该综述研究了铁死亡（一种铁依赖性细胞死亡形式）在前列腺癌中的作用，探索其潜在的分子机制和靶向治疗策略的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240417/New-research-pinpoints-key-pathways-in-prostate-cancers-vulnerability-to-ferroptosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240417/New-research-pinpoints-key-pathways-in-prostate-cancers-vulnerability-to-ferroptosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fd5d0bf2-70ef-4097-a8ac-4b2d9c046bda Wed, 17 Apr 2024 22:36:00 -0400 New research pinpoints key pathways in prostate cancer's vulnerability to ferroptosis
全球疾病负担研究强调了 COVID-19 的影响和健康不平等考虑到年龄和人口的差异，自 2010 年以来，艾滋病毒/艾滋病和腹泻导致的过早死亡和健康状况不佳的比率已减少了一半，同期由伤害造成的疾病负担的比率下降了四分之一根据《柳叶刀》发表的一项新研究，各国的规模。该研究衡量了因早逝和健康状况不佳而损失的年数中的疾病负担。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240417/Global-disease-burden-study-highlights-COVID-19-impact-and-health-inequities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240417/Global-disease-burden-study-highlights-COVID-19-impact-and-health-inequities.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=270d8587-944f-4a4f-873f-1b1d8173cda9 Wed, 17 Apr 2024 22:35:03 -0400 Global disease burden study highlights COVID-19 impact and health inequities
